question: Who has won the 2017 Ballon d'Or award for the year's best player?
explanation: Cristiano Ronaldo, the Real Madrid and Portugal superstar, has won the 2017 Ballon d\'Or award for the year\'s best player in Paris, France. It is his record-equalling 5th Ballon d\'Or award with his great Barcelona rival Lionel Messi. Ronaldo, who also won the FIFA Men\'s Player of the Year award in October 2017, added the 2017 Ballon d\'Or to his previous wins in 2008, 2013, 2014 and 2016.
